ai-tika-vin05t9:0_0: Discussion of the proper conduct for those sarongs
ai-tika-vin05t9:1_0: After determining the robe-cloth: if he has abiding in the three robes, he may stay apart from another three robes.
ai-tika-vin05t9:1_1: For when a robe is determined in these three ways: if it is unincluded, he stays in the room in one robe-cloth, if it is allowed, he becomes subject to relinquishment at dawn, he should wear it in one robe-making procedure.

ai-tika-vin05t9:5_0: If the robe-cloth belonging to one clan and having many rooms: if the robe is kept in the house, one must stay within the house.
ai-tika-vin05t9:5_1: If one gets a robe in a room, one must stay in the room where the robe is kept, or not go beyond arm’s reach of the room.
ai-tika-vin05t9:5_2: If the family is enclosed in a room and having many rooms: if the robe is kept in a room, one must stay in that house, or at the main entrance, or at the foot of the room.
